Disease: Common Cold    Medication to be taken: Paracetamol
Influenza    Medication to be taken: Oseltamivir
Food Poisoning    Medication to be taken: ORS(to prevent dehydration)
Strep Throat    Medication to be taken: Take paracetamol for pain and fever and consult a doctor
Allergies     Medication to be taken: Cetirizine or fexofenadine
Gastroenteritis    Medication to be taken: ORS(to prevent dehydration)
Severe Flu    Medication to be taken: oseltamivir
Migraine    Medication to be taken: Sumatriptan
Fatigue Syndrome   Medication to be taken: Multivitamins
Bronchitis    Medication to be taken: Salbutamol
Sinusitis    Medication to be taken: Saline Nasal Spray, Oxymetazoline
Typhoid    Medication to be taken: ORS for hydration and Ciprofloxacin
Viral Infection    Medication to be taken: Paracetamol and adequate hydration
Cholera    Medication to be taken: ORS (to prevent dehydration)
Dengue Fever    Medication to be taken: Paracetamol and adequate hydration
Pneumonia    Medication to be taken: Cipmox CV-625
Viral Fever    Medication to be taken: Paracetamol and lots of fluids
Severe Infection    Precaution to be taken: Consult a doctor immediately
